definition: (myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift

sentences.english: The peaches in his paintings are always in even number, meaning that good things always come in double.
sentences.chinese: 寿桃的数量也是画双不画单，包含了好事成双的寓意。

sentences.english: And for old people, we'll prepare Longevity Peaches.
sentences.chinese: 如果是给老人过生日，就要准备寿桃。

definition: the dragon and phoenix are symbols of good fortune (idiom)/auspicious/decorated with auspicious symbols such as the dragon and the phoenix
We wish you long life and riches! (idiom, conventional greeting)
Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom)/Long may you live!
the more sons, the more happiness (idiom)
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
